title: Piccadilly Jim
description: The life of Jimmy Crocker has been little more than one drunken brawl after another. His formidable Aunt Nesta has had enough of his antics and decrees that the young Crocker must be reformed.However, Jimmy has fallen in love and decided to reform himself.Unfortunately, to win the heart of his intended, Jimmy must pretend to be someone else and take part in the kidnapping of Aunt Nesta's loathsome offspring Ogden. The reformation of oneself cab be a decidedly tricky business.
author: P.G. Wodehouse
